title: AES Encoder/Decoder
summary: Secures text with AES standard encryption, providing tools to encrypt and decrypt sensitive data.

title: Arrays Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting data arrays or text into encrypted form and decrypting them back into their original format, makes data storage and processing easier.

title: ASCII Encoder/Decoder
summary: A tool for converting text to ASCII code and vice versa, allowing the conversion of characters to numeric representation.

title: Atbash Encoder/Decoder
summary: A classic cipher that reverses the alphabet, changing each letter to its opposite (A to Z, B to Y, etc.).

title: Base16 Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converts text to hexadecimal (Base16) representation and decrypts it back to its original text form.

title: Base32 Encoder/Decoder
summary: A tool for converting text to Base32 code, often used in data encryption and secure processing.

title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converts text to Base64 format, making it easy to send binary data in a secure text format.

title: Binary Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to binary code and vice versa, allows digital representation of text in the form of binary numbers.

title: Block Cipher Encoder/Decoder
summary: A tool for encrypting and decrypting data using block ciphers, processing data in block chunks for more secure and stronger protection.

title: Blowfish Encoder/Decoder
summary: Using Blowfish algorithm to encrypt and decrypt data, with high security strength in block encryption, efficient and fast in the process.

title: Caesar Cipher Encoder/Decoder
summary: A classic rotation cipher that replaces each letter with a letter moved a few positions in the alphabet.

title: Color Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting colors in color code formats (RGB, Hex) and vice versa, helps developers manage color data.

title: File Encoder/Decoder
summary: A tool to encrypt and decrypt files to maintain data confidentiality and security.

title: Hexadecimal Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to hexadecimal representation and decrypting it back to its original form, often used in computer data processing.

title: HTML Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to safe HTML entities and vice versa, helps avoid rendering and security issues on web pages.

title: Image Encoder/Decoder
summary: A tool for encrypting and decrypting images, allowing visual protection of data in image format.

title: Lowercase Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to lowercase and vice versa, helps in normalization of text-based data.

title: Morse Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to Morse code and vice versa, allowing communication in dots and dashes format.

title: Nato Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to NATO phonetic alphabet code (A to Alpha, B to Bravo, etc.) and vice versa, often used in radio communications for clarity.

title: Octal Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to base-8 (octal) number representation and vice versa, is useful in low-level data processing.

title: Rivest Cipher Encoder/Decoder
summary: Using RC4 stream cipher for data encryption and decryption, it is fast in processing and is often used in protocols such as SSL and WEP.

title: ROT-13 Encoder/Decoder
summary: Using the ROT-13 cipher to encrypt text by replacing each letter with a letter 13 positions away in the alphabet, and can be decrypted in the same way.

title: Subscript Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to subscript form and vice versa, often used in scientific and mathematical notation.

title: Superscript Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to superscript form and vice versa, facilitates the presentation of mathematical symbols and exponents.

title: Unicode Encoder/Decoder
summary: Tool to convert text to Unicode code and vice versa, supporting various international symbols and characters.

title: Uppercase Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text to uppercase and vice versa, helps in formatting and standardizing text data.

title: URL Encoder/Decoder
summary: Converting text into a safe URL format (URL encoding) and decrypting it back, helps in managing safe URL parameters and data.
